content: We usually have a C-CDA IAT topic called "Ask the ONC" where implementers can ask questions about ONC's work on the Score Card for assessing C-CDA documents against best practices or request clarifications on issues that are creating challenges or roadblocks for implementers. This thread is being started to offer a spot to bring up those questions in between IATs. @Matt Rahn may be able to help find the answers you are seeking.
